body.name: Wireless Doorbell Camera with Chime Ringer, HD Live Image, Night Vision, Home Security System, Rechargeable Battery, 2-Way Audio, PIR Motion Detection, 2.4G Wi-Fi, Easy Setup Cloud Storage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 31 mins
features: Safe and Encrypted Cloud Storage: Benefit from AES-128 encrypted cloud storage through an optional subscription plan (available separately), complete with a 30-day free trial for continuous recording, playback, and sharing.
Smart Motion Detection: With the camera doorbell, get instant alerts on your mobile device upon motion detection, keeping you informed of activity at your entrance.
Advanced Night Vision Technology: This security camera has infrared lights and a smart infrared sensor, which deliver sharp, high-resolution videos in low-light situations, day or night.

Bonus Doorbell Chime for Extra Convenience: Install the free chime in your living area, kitchen, or dining room for immediate notifications. Connect multiple chimes to a single doorbell camera for enhanced flexibility.
Real-Time Two-way Communication: Effortlessly engage with visitors from anywhere in real-time through the video doorbell.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wireless Doorbell Camera with AI Detection, HD Live Image, 2-Way Audio Safe and Encrypted Cloud Storage: Benefit from AES-128 encrypted cloud storage through an optional subscription plan (available separately), complete with a 30-day free trial for continuous recording, playback, and sharing.Smart Motion Detection: With the camera doorbell, get instant alerts on your mobile device upon motion detection, keeping you informed of activity at your entrance.Advanced Night Vision Technology: This video doorbell has a smart infrared sensor, which deliver sharp, high-resolution videos in low-light situations, day or night.Doorbell Chime for Extra Convenience: Install the chime in your living area, kitchen, or dining room for immediate notifications. Connect multiple chimes to a single doorbell camera for enhanced flexibility.Real-Time Two-way Communication: Effortlessly engage with visitors from anywhere in real-time through the video doorbell.

Smart Motion Detection With the camera doorbell, get instant alerts on your mobile device upon motion detection, keeping you informed of activity at your entrance. Crystal Clear Wide-Angle Lens Record and view live footage with remarkable detail and precision. Instant Alert Get instant alerts on your mobile device upon motion detection, keeping you informed of activity at your entrance.

Comprehensive Security Solution Complete with a 5200mAh rechargeable battery and a indoor chime, this Smart WiFi doorbell camera offers an all-encompassing home security system. Robust 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Connection The surveillance cameras doorbell is optimized for 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, guaranteeing quick and stable connections (5GHz Wi-Fi not supported). Durable Weatherproof Design With an IP65 dust-proof and waterproof rating, this security camera consistently delivers security in a range of weather conditions year-round.

Doorbell Camera Installation and Usage Tips: 1.Remove the insulation tape from the bottom of the batteries before use. 2.The included batteries are rechargeable; charging adapter not included. 3.Fully charge the batteries using a DC 5V 1A or 5V 2A power adapter (a phone charger is suitable) before mounting the doorbell camera. 4.The indoor chime requires a USB adapter or USB outlet for power. 5.The doorbell camera is compatible with 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi only; use high-speed, stable Wi-Fi for optimal performance.
What's in the box: Doorbell Camera x 1 Rechargeable Battery x 2 USB Indoor Chime x 1 Adhesive Tape x 1 Screw Pack x 1 USB Charging Cablex 1 User Manual x 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth it!
reviews.reviewText: This is the second camera I’ve purchased from this company and my very first doorbell camera and I am very impressed with the affordability and build quality of this doorbell camera. The picture is nice and clear and the sound is great. I can get instant notifications sent to my phone and the doorbell chime is nice and loud. The set up was simple and easy and you will love it!

What I liked about the camera is disease of operation and easy setup okay only thing I really dislike about it it's it's not secure you have to get an external bracket so nobody want to steal it but all know it's a very good camera sound quality is good the image quality is good ease of use you know what I use it for is the front door security I want to know who's in front of my door and I have the microphone I could talk to him you know if somebody trespassing it's something I can talk to him without opening the door or if somebody's living the package I can talk to him you know or the mailman what to do I like that
